A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Great great movie!  I've been a Star Wars fan since I was five years old and this is the movie that I've been waiting for.  It's visually gorgeous\, the story is fun and the battle scenes are captivating.  It's The Dark Knight of the Star Wars Franchise. 

I am not sure why or how this movie only has a 52% audience score but I am going to assume that it must be non Star Wars fans scoring. 

All I hope is that Disney and JJ Abrams keep doing what they are doing and not allow these non fans to influence the last and final installment.
